Projects.title: Project: Audit NO.001_Botium Toys
desc: This is my reimagined internal audit for a fictional company that I created in 2024 while studying for the Google Cybersecurity Professional Certificate on Coursera.
During my training with Merit America, I decided to revisit the project with more structure and clarity, taking time to reabsorb internal audit standards and rebuild it from the ground up.
To reflect my personal brand, I designed a custom audit template in Affinity, using my graphic design skills to bring my original report alive.
